checklist: Set up your final project page, document the concept, sketches, artistic and scientific references
Answer the 5W: Who, What, When, Where, Why
Create a quick prototype of it. (physical, digital, collage or render)
tasks.name: PPD Review on Workflow - GANTT
outcomes: References: concept development, research, where does the project innovate
Documentation: Who, What, When, Where, Why
Fabrication: simple quick prototypes or (material) samples if coherent
Final outcome: Personal Final Project page, sketch of a project planning and first Gantt chart
Originality - Aesthetics: Has the design and innovation been thought through and elaborated?
